product_name: NYX Professional MakeupLip Lingerie XXL Long-Lasting Matte Liquid Lipstick
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackNYX Professional Makeup Lip Lingerie XXL is a vegan, transfer proof liquid lipstick with 16HR wear, no crack, no-bleed, and no fade! All day comfort.
details: DetailsBenefits16 hour transfer proof lipstick with smooth matte finishThis lip color creates the appearance of smooth, fuller-looking lipsXxtra fiery shades designed for warm & deep skin tones, this flexible formula provides lip color that moves with you, just like your favorite shapewearThis matte lipstick feels lightweight & comfortable all dayFeatures a unique arrow applicator that hugs lips for precise application, 1 swipe = full coverage colorDelivers a sweet & smooth scent in every swipeAvailable in many nude lip shades amped-up with color saturation & designed to enhance all complexions100% vegan lip formula (no animal-derived ingredient or by-product)Cruelty freeItem 2595045How To UseUse the precise arrow-shaped applicator to mold your lips starting with the cupid's bow and the outer line of your lips then fill-in for full-bodied smooth matte color. Let it dry for around 60 seconds to lock in your XXtra lip look!IngredientsDimethicone, Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Nylon-611/Dimethicone Copolymer, Dimethicone Crosspolymer, C30-45 Alkyldimethylsilyl Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Lauroyl Lysine, Triethoxysilylethyl Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Silica Silylate, Isopropyl Titanium Triisostearate, Sorbic Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Parfum / Fragrance [+/- May Contain: CI 15850 / Red 7, CI 45410 / Red 28 Lake, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, CI 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, CI 42090 / Blue 1 Lake]. Fil D260469/2Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Use the precise arrow-shaped applicator to mold your lips starting with the cupid's bow and the outer line of your lips then fill-in for full-bodied smooth matte color. Let it dry for around 60 seconds to lock in your XXtra lip look!

reviews.headline: A favorite of mine
reviews.comments: I have this lipstick in a few different shades now and all are great! The formula is not overly drying for a liquid lipstick and lasts all day through eating drinking and general tomfoolery. Highly recommend!

reviews.headline: Beautiful color
reviews.comments: My daughter & I love all NYX products especially everything that's lip. This color is perfect

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: This is the best and longest lasting lip product I've ever used

reviews.headline: Love the feeling and colors
reviews.comments: This lipstick is beautiful on - I have it in a couple of different colors and each one is silky and smooth.

reviews.headline: Woweeee Jeffreee has competition!!!
reviews.comments: I've always used Jeffree star liquid lipstick, and I love it so muchâ€¦ But he keeps discontinuing my favorite colors, which was Anna Nicole. Color in Fuego is PERFECT!!! I am so happy I found this because I usually have tried Kylie and I haven't liked the shades she has availableâ€¦ This is so convenient and it's less expensive, but 100 percent worth it!!! My new go to!!!

reviews.headline: Need to try a different color
reviews.comments: I like that this lipstick stays on a little longer than my current brand, but I didn't like the color I picked. Looked like it was going to be the same as what I was using but when applied with the wand it's a LOT darker. Will need to try a different color.

reviews.headline: HOLY GRAIL
reviews.comments: Im a makeup artist and Ive used coutless liquid lipsticks in my life. Brides typically want something long lasting and beautiful and these are THE BEST LIPSTICK EVER! IVE NEVER LOVED A MAKEUP PRODUCT MORE THAN THE SHADE PEACH FLIRT! I cannot emphazise this enough.. THEY ARE THE GOAT! GET THEM!

reviews.headline: Want to love this so bad, but..
reviews.comments: Some of the colors are nothing like the bottle, but once I found the shade for me, it looked great. Unfortunately, i am suffering such an allergic reaction to this product. My top lip is completely swollen and peeling, also really dried out. I rarely have any type of reaction to make up, so not sure which ingredient is causing this.

reviews.headline: I buy this lipstick again and again
reviews.comments: If you want ALL DAY wear this lipstick is for you. It's lasts and lasts and doesn't dry out your lips.

reviews.headline: Not happy with the color - it's definitely grey
reviews.comments: Might look for a different color because this one is definitely grey. The color shown online resembled a similar color to a lip liner I purchased but when I opened it, it's definitely grey and not at all pink like showing online.

reviews.headline: I hate to tell everybody how much I love this lip stain!!!
reviews.comments:
This is my favorite lip stain. I've ever used because it does not dry your lips out much at all like most lip stains. Do although I do use a clear lip gloss over it, but it is a mat and I like that shiny look for my finish. I hate to tell you the color that I like because I know that they'll discontinue it or I'll never be able to find it again, but the best color I found is called pushed up! It's fabulous as it's just a little bit darker than your lip color so it's very enhancing but not over the top!!
Thank you, NYX lingerie for this wonderful product!

reviews.headline: Bold
reviews.comments: This is a great option for the price point because the color is bold and long lasting.  However, it can feel dry. The dry down time was quick which is always nice.

reviews.headline: New Favorite Liquid Lipstick
reviews.comments: These are my new go to for lip color. The colors are nice and don't dry out my lips. As with most lip color, I do have to reapply but not as often ads with others. The product does have a fragrance that at times can be a bit much for me. I like the price point and the longevity of this liquid lipstick and it doesn't bleed. I'll be buying it again.

reviews.headline: Love love love this lipstick
reviews.comments: Does last a very very long time. I got it off with dove soap and water and a washcloth  Color is magnificent.

reviews.headline: Long wearing lip color
reviews.comments: Love this color.. They were sold out at one store so I stopped the next town over and they had it... I love the color and then I put a shimmery white colored sparkly gloss over the top so it doesn't feel so dry on my lips.

reviews.headline: Lasting & not dry feeling
reviews.comments: It's always hard to find a replacement color when I run out but this was a perfect match! It doesn't make my lips feel as dried out as others do!

reviews.headline: Long lasting, doesn't feather, light weight
reviews.comments:
Here's a more detailed and vivid version of your review that still feels natural:

â¸»

Absolutely love this formula and the shade range! If you have a deep skin tone and struggle to find a nude that doesn't lean too brown or wash you out, the shade "Low Cut" is a total game-changer. It has a beautiful pink undertone that adds just the right balance of warmth and brightness without looking ashy or overly bold.

The formula is incredible - dries down super fast, doesn't crack or flake, and feels incredibly lightweight. You honestly forget you're wearing anything at all. And the staying power? Unreal. I wore it through meals, drinks, and even overnight just to test it / and it did not budge. You could literally go two days without reapplying, and it still looks fresh. Highly recommend?

reviews.headline: survived a full day on a 4 year old for dance recital
reviews.comments: She smeared her other lip color up her nose while scratching it. I scrambled and found this affordable highly pigmented color I couldn't scrub off my hand after testing it. it lasted 8 hours without reapplication. I did not attempt to use the applicator, it's pretty big and holds a lot of product. I did use a small lip brush and paint it on. We used the dark brick red, the color was beautiful!

reviews.headline: I think it's changed Formula
reviews.comments: I dont know what has changed with this product, but this thing doesnt even last seconds for me. Like i will put on a full lip and it doesnt even set on my lips. I think the maybeline superstay is way better im gonna return it.

reviews.headline: This is a perfect (even better) dupe.
reviews.comments:
I have very sensitive skin and this compares to, and beats, a lip brand I broke down to try twenty years too late. Nice, but twice the price of this formula.  

I applied the lipstick,  wore it through beans,  rice, veggies and a ginger ale with no effort to spare my lip color, and fell asleep during a movie. It was still intact after 12 hours of wear, with no checking, flaking, or touch up. I'm amazed. 

Make sure lips are exfoliated and prepared, like any matte lip, and hydrate afterwards. 

I ordered a couple of colors to try. I'm partial to the MAC 90's browns and brick,  but I'm now allergic. These are the perfect pigments with a formula update.

media.headline: My new fav lippie
media.caption: Perfect lippie that won't come off under your mask

faceoff_positive.comments: These last through mask wear and drinking. Vanilla scent, mousse-y formula, and great everyday nudes. Top to b: strip'd down (browny mauve), xxpose me (peachy nude), flaunt it (cool mauve), warm up (warm red brown).
faceoff_positive.headline: New fave lippy

faceoff_negative.comments: I purchased two different shades of lipstick and the formulas feel completely different. The first shade I bought is #30 it is very smooth, and a liquid consistency. The second one is #22 and it's the complete opposite. It's very thick and not as smooth to apply as #30. With the brown shade, I was able to apply a little with full coverage the red one is not the same. I was very excited to try this product because they're vegan. I am now a little skeptical about purchasing another shade.
faceoff_negative.headline: Fell in love with one..

rollup.name: Lip Lingerie XXL Long-Lasting Matte Liquid Lipstick
